description: Two parallel lines, Lin and Ray, share everything but can never meet.
title: Parallel Lives
n_1: Lin and Ray run parallel in the infinite plane, sharing dreams and stories.
c1_1: Isn't it wonderful, Ray? We see the same world.
c2_1: Yes, Lin, but I wish we could meet, just once.
n_2: They share the same views, the same sky, yet an invisible gap keeps them apart.
c1_2: Do you think there's a way to break this barrier?
c2_2: If only we could bend the rules of geometry.
n_3: Seasons change around them, witnessing their unwavering paths and shared laughter.
c1_3: At least we have the same sunset, Ray.
c2_3: Yes, every day it's ours, Lin.
n_4: Despite the distance, their parallel existence forms a bond unbroken by space.
c1_4: I guess in our way, we are together.
